author: Aaron Weaver
title: The Real Reason the Stock Market is Surging – Hint: It’s Not Bernie Sanders
description: The stock market rallied again today. Many analysts think it's due to Bernie Sanders dropping out of the presidential race, but that's only one small factor. The post The Real Reason the Stock Market is Surging – Hint: It’s Not Bernie Sanders appeared first o…
content:
• The stock market rallied again today.
  • Many think the surge was caused by Bernie Sanders dropping out of the presidential race.
  • But the market has been rallying for days, based on hopeful news that the COVID-19 pandemic is peaking.
